scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation, with the Virgin Mary kneeling in prayer before an open book. She is dressed in a blue mantle and has a halo. To her right, the Angel Gabriel, also with a halo and wings, is seated and points towards Mary, holding a scepter topped with a crown. Above Gabriel, the Holy Spirit is represented as a dove descending with rays of light. The figures are situated within a richly decorated architectural setting that includes columns, arches, and a canopy, suggesting a sacred or noble space. In the background, classical-style architecture with columns and inscriptions is visible.
